title: Looks Are Deceptive
description: Constance Faith Rux is eighteen years old. She lives in a small west Michigan town with her family. This is her first book published although she has been writing poetry since she can remember. She was diagnosed with manic depression at the age of fourteen; however, with the help of her faith, family, fianc and friends, has learned to overcome the disorder. Constance is going to college for drama and journalism although she hopes to continue with her poetry and to publish a second teen poetry book.
author: Constance Faith Rux
